TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowIdleBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 一种服务行为，可以控制何时卸载和持久保存空闲工作流实例。

span.span: A service behavior that controls when idle workflow instances are unloaded and persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 当设置为值的值大于和工作流然后进入空闲状态 （因为延迟活动） 如果未更改的工作流实例它将从内存中删除通过调用中止，而不是通过正常卸载进程...When is set to a value greater than the value of and the workflow then goes idle (because of a Delay activity) if the workflow instance has not changed it will be removed from memory by calling Abort, rather than going through the normal unloading process.. 这是运行时优化和数据不会丢失，但需要卸载跟踪时，查看跟踪日志的开发人员可能会看到中止跟踪。This is a runtime optimization and no data is lost, but a developer looking at trace log may see an Abort trace when expecting an Unload trace. 有关如何使用此行为的示例，请参阅[Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)For an example of how to use this behavior see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定工作流进入空闲状态到变为保留状态之间的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the that occurs between the time the workflow becomes idle and is persisted.

value.span: 用于确定何时保留工作流的时间跨度。

span.span: The time span used to determine when a workflow is persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从工作流实例进入空闲状态时算起。The begins to elapse when the workflow instance becomes idle. 如果您想要更积极地保留工作流实例，同时还要尽可能长久地在内存中保存该实例，此属性会非常有用。This property is useful if you want to persist a workflow instance more aggressively while still keeping the instance in memory for as long as possible. 此属性的默认值为 。The default value for this property is . 只有当 属性的值小于 时，此属性才有效。The property is only valid if its value is less than . 如果大于该特性，将忽略此项。If it is greater, it is ignored. 如果 指定的 早于 指定的 ，工作流必须在卸载之前完成永久保留。If the specified by elapses before the specified by , persistence must complete before the workflow is unloaded. 这意味着卸载操作可能要等到工作流永久保留完毕才能进行。This implies that the unload operation may be delayed until the workflow is persisted. 永久层负责处理暂时性错误的任何重试操作，并仅在发生不可恢复的错误时引发异常。The persistence layer is responsible for handling any retries for transient errors and only throws exceptions on non-recoverable errors. 因此，任何在持久性操作期间引发的异常都将被视为是致命的，并导致该工作流实例中止。Therefore, any exceptions thrown during persistence are treated as fatal and the workflow instance is aborted.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定工作流进入空闲状态到变为卸载状态之间的 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the that occurs between the time workflow becomes idle and is unloaded.

value.span: 用于确定何时卸载工作流的时间跨度。

span.span: The time span used to determine when a workflow is unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 1 分钟。The default value is 1 minute. 卸载一个工作流意味着该工作流已持久保存。Unloading a workflow implies that it is also persisted. 如果 设置为零，则工作流实例会被永久保留并在工作流进入空闲状态后立即将其卸载。If is set to zero the workflow instance is persisted and unloaded immediately after the workflow becomes idle. 将 设置为 可以有效禁用卸载操作。Setting to effectively disables the unload operation. 处于空闲状态的工作流实例永远不会被卸载。Idle workflow instances are never unloaded.
